data.text: And he is also indirectly responsible for every mass shooting that has occurred since he took office. You can’t demonize entire races of people without anything bad happening. The blood of the many victims is on @realDonaldTrump’s hands.

sent to journalists,celebrities,and Democrats a couple of weeks ago. @realDonaldTrump can deny that he is responsible but we all know that is a lie. Calling the press the enemy of the people as often as he does will end with someone getting hurt and it will be all his fault.
